items.content_html: This repository hosts a lightweight SMTP (Simple Mail Transfer Protocol) server implemented in JavaScript. SMTP is the standard protocol for sending email messages across networks. This server is designed for educational and testing purposes, providing a simple and easy-to-understand implementation of the SMTP protocol's core functionalities.
items.title: hmshuv/SMTP_Server_Project: This repository hosts a lightweight SMTP (Simple Mail Transfer Protocol) server implemented in JavaScript. SMTP is the standard protocol for sending email messages across networks. This server is designed for educational and testing purposes, providing a simple and easy-to-understand implementation of the SMTP protocol's core functionalities.

items.content_html: This is a music player that is designed to be lightweight and play music from your home computer rather than from the Internet. Users can choose a folder and the program will automatically search that folder for MP3 files to add to the library. If this project becomes advanced enough, I may upgrade it to become a hybrid music player (i.e. play music online and from your computer).
items.title: dommie123/WaveMusic: This is a music player that is designed to be lightweight and play music from your home computer rather than from the Internet. Users can choose a folder and the program will automatically search that folder for MP3 files to add to the library. If this project becomes advanced enough, I may upgrade it to become a hybrid music player (i.e. play music online and from your computer).

items.content_html: MERN Auth is a lightweight full-stack web application with user authentication, protected routes, and image uploads. Built using MongoDB, Express.js, React, and Node.js, it offers a simple yet powerful solution for implementing authentication in your projects.
items.title: SarangaSiriwardhana9/Full-Stack-MERN-Auth-project: MERN Auth is a lightweight full-stack web application with user authentication, protected routes, and image uploads. Built using MongoDB, Express.js, React, and Node.js, it offers a simple yet powerful solution for implementing authentication in your projects.
